Name: Percentage of cases where 'Request Payment' occurs without any prior rejection (i.e., no occurrence of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER', 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION', 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR', 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER', or 'Declaration REJECTED by MISSING' in the same case)
Metric: Percentage of 'Request Payment' out of all cases
